name: Last Day Archives - Restricted Access
description:
Fullscreen is recommended!

Contols: 1 Hit - 1 Kill, WSAD to move and jump, you can't use ladders, they are there for the AI, LMB to shoot. You cannot spam-shoot and it's done on purpose. 1 shot per 0.2 second.

Restricted Access is a retro-ish horror-styled platformer game with advanced AI that learns to predict your movements over time.
